articles.title: Gut microbiome remodeling induced by microplastic exposure in humans.
articles.summary: Microplastic exposure in humans alters gut microbiome composition, potentially increasing bacterial diversity linked to disease risks, with significant changes in microbial abundance and short-chain fatty acid production.
